name: Shooty McTooty
description:
Disclaimer: Shooty McTooty was an early 2.5D / Isometric 3D twin-stick shooter I created to get myself familiar with unity! Development has paused for now but I would love to come back to it to fix it and implement some bizarre mechanics or modes of play but as of now I am working on bigger projects.

You play as Shooty McTooty who just loves killing other capsules and cylinders, look at that smile! Get into fighting shape by shooting shapes, today!

Controls:

W A S D will move shooty around.
Shooty aims towards the mouse, left mouse click shoots!
